name: places/ChIJ7-0_1YVYwokRJZ_nCHuro7w
formattedAddress: 225 W 83rd St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 225 W 83rd St, New York, NY 10024-4952, USA

originalText.text:
I wrote this review once already and it was somehow deleted which doesn’t surprise me.
I lived in the Bromley for more than 30 years and always loved the building and location. In the last 5 years, the situation deteriorated with chronic special assessments and an odd board response to my questions regarding these assessments and above market common charges.
There was a large hallway reno that necessitated a special assessment in 2018 thru 2020. After that we were told there would be another assessment for Local Law 11 which started in 2021 and now is going until YE 2023. This law is every 5 years and should not be under special assessment and should be budgeted for. To have 3 years of assessment for local 11 means they had very little or no money set aside for it.  I made inquiries to see why this happened and spoke to the Chairman and Treasurer and never received a reason for this.  I was offered a private meeting with the Board and their outside legal counsel. I thought it was odd that the Board would have counsel since they cannot be sued for performing their normal duties and this law firm specialized in law suits against Board members. I said I would have the meeting, even with their attorneys present, but only if the meeting could be opened to all owners and they refused.
At that point, I started suffering reprisals. I stopped receiving notices of pharmacy deliveries, maintenance workers either wouldn’t come up or came up and robbed us and nothing was done about it. I was locked out of building link and not allowed to communicate with other owners. While I am not one to automatically think of malfeasance, I do think that people’s actions speak volumes. An honest question deserves an honest response.
There are no term limits to Board seats and I think this is a mistake. I think there should be some mechanism for forensic audits (especially after large renovation projects) and that no owner should pay for the Board’s outside counsel.  I also think Brown Harris is weak and should be replaced. This building can be great again, but needs a new Chairman and Treasurer.

originalText.text: Location, location, location & amenities to boot- valet service, separate gym/ aerobics center, roof deck. indoor pool, locker space, kids room, party room, message room, private lockers, yoga studio, basketball court,  sauna, steam, Superbly professional staff, immaculately run by building manager, attached Icon parking garage with private entrance,  retro fitted HEPA air filtration system, redone hallways, elevators, more upgrades on the way honestly hands down #1 A++++++++

text.text: Location, location, location & amenities to boot- valet service, separate gym/ aerobics center, roof deck. indoor pool, locker space, kids room, party room, message room, private lockers, yoga studio, basketball court,  sauna, steam, Superbly professional staff, immaculately run by building manager, attached Icon parking garage with private entrance,  retro fitted HEPA air filtration system, redone hallways, elevators, more upgrades on the way honestly hands down #1 A++++++++

originalText.text: Besides the top notch apartments and excellent location, the Bromley has an incredible gym. They have a work out room, a swimming pool, a spa, and you can even book lessons with a professional trainer. All residents in the building have access to the gym, and if you're a guest of a resident I definitely recommend checking it out.

text.text: Besides the top notch apartments and excellent location, the Bromley has an incredible gym. They have a work out room, a swimming pool, a spa, and you can even book lessons with a professional trainer. All residents in the building have access to the gym, and if you're a guest of a resident I definitely recommend checking it out.

originalText.text: We are High End Painting Contractors, we work in a lot of NYC apartment buildings so have to deal with back office, door men and service staff for coordination on our projects. The processes and interactions with all personnel at The Bromley has been by far the most pleasant and streamlined we have experienced.

originalText.text: Amazing friendly staff in a beautiful clean building.
